entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as sitting down opposite Harry behind his desk.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as avoiding Dumbledore's eyes and feeling gratitude towards Sirius.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is Harry's friend and godfather. He is described as putting a hand on Harry's shoulder and speaking harshly to Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is going to question Harry about what happened after he touched the Portkey in the maze.
Sirius is supporting Harry by suggesting that he should be allowed to rest.
